note: Data from international providers and national agencies. Learning outcomes over time should still be interpreted with caution.
title: Share of students at the end of primary education achieving minimum reading proficiency
subtitle: Minimum proficiency for the end of [primary](#dod:primary-education) education is defined as: _"Students interpret and give some explanations about the main and secondary ideas in different types of texts. They establish connections between main ideas on a text and their personal experiences as well as general knowledge"_.
